snippet: In documents filed on Thursday, Twitter noted that it has been greatly expanding its inventory of advertising slots, especially for promoted tweets.
abstract: Twitter notes in documents filed for its initial public offering that it has been greatly expanding its inventory of advertising slots, especially for promoted tweets.

byline.contributor: David Jolly and Mark Scott contributed reporting from London and Peter Eavis and Jenna Wortham from New York.

lead_paragraph: In documents filed on Thursday, Twitter noted that it has been greatly expanding its inventory of advertising slots, especially for promoted tweets.

headline.main: What Can Be Sold in 140 Characters? That’s Now the Challenge for Twitter
headline.print_headline: What Can Be Sold in 140 Characters? That’s Now the Challenge for Twitter
